definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
habit/custom/usual practice/to be used to/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study
to learn on the job/to be on probation

sentences.english: Anything that is new to you must be written down in order to review it after class and learn it well.
sentences.chinese: 所有新知識必須寫下來並做好筆記以便課後進行復習。

sentences.english: She told me that she had been studying French for 5years.
sentences.chinese: 她告訴我她己經學習法語5年了。

sentences.english: She noted only slight difficulty in concentrating while reading and writing.
sentences.chinese: 她發覺在讀習和寫作時，注意力有點不易集中。

sentences.english: To attain proficiency in the dual aspects of mental and physical discipline takes a high degree of devotion and dedication.
sentences.chinese: 爲取得身心兩方面的功夫，習武者須投入大量精力。

sentences.english: Learn to esteem other people's personal space.
sentences.chinese: 壆習尊重他人的俬人空間。

sentences.english: The questions and format will be similar to previous years (although the exercises from some past years were 5 hours long, not three).
sentences.chinese: 即使過去部分習作爲五小時而非三小時。

sentences.english: So for the sake of our health and our study, we must have breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 所以，爲了我們的健康和學，習，我們必須喫早餐。

sentences.english: The child brings TREMENDOUS INGENUITY to the task of learning.
sentences.chinese: 兒童在壆習語言時，發揮了極大的靈活性。

sentences.english: Mr Xi's speech was peppered with references to values, but did not come close to suggesting that any were universal.
sentences.chinese: 習的講話頻繁提及價值觀念，卻無一暗示出世界性。

sentences.english: The law never suffers anything contrary to trun.
sentences.chinese: 法律習決不容忍違反真理的事情。

sentences.english: Mary gave some counsel on how to learn English.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗提了一些如何壆習英語的建議。

sentences.english: Secondly, carry on the review plan regularly.
sentences.chinese: 其次，有規律地執行復習計劃。

sentences.english: Xi père later served as governor of Guangdong province and as vice-premier of China.
sentences.chinese: 習父親後來成爲廣東省省長和中國副總理。

sentences.english: For convenience of intensive study, he has an intense purpose of making friend with me.
sentences.chinese: 爲便於強化壆習，他有和我交朋友的強烈意向。

sentences.english: Oxford is full of curious old customs like that.
sentences.chinese: 象這樣古怪的陳習在牛津比比皆是。

definition: to read a book/to study/to attend school
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
